overview: 1 year has passed since the murders. Considering the obviousness that the killer could never have survived the winter in the forest, Michael goes camping in the forest with new friends; and is suddenly confronted with the cruel truth. With all his strength, he manages to drag himself to his last friend Charlie, who is still alive, but who realizes the seriousness of the situation far too late...
title: Angriff aus dem Schatten 2
